feed.title: GoDoxy Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for GoDoxy: v0.9.7
entry.content:
What's changed

  • fix: trim spaces and convert alias and host to lowercase to make containers with Capital letters in name work #65

Full Changelog: https://github.com/yusing/go-proxy/compare/0.9.6...0.9.7

entry.title: New release for GoDoxy: v0.9.8
entry.content:
What's changed

  • bug: Fix CloudflareRealIP not resolving correct remote IP
  • change: CloudflareRealIP middleware will now skip all local IPs when resolving
  • docker: GitHub Workflow update, image name change to ghcr.io/yusing/godoxy with tag latest for stable build and nightly for nightly build (while old one still works)

Full Changelog: https://github.com/yusing/go-proxy/compare/0.9.7...v0.9.8

entry.title: New release for GoDoxy: v0.9.9
entry.content:
What's Changed

Changed

  • Add bypass.user_agents option to RedirectHTTP middleware ```yaml entrypoint: middlewares:
    • use: RedirectHTTP bypass: user_agents: # bypass any User-Agent that contains "foo" or "bar" (case insensitive) - foo - bar ```

Fixes

  • RedirectHTTP middleware bug 71ad13256effb21e3d5090937a812b7862550592
  • panic crash on start #69 #71 357ad26a0e97501f1e6fdab88c4532bb10998685 9b2ee628aa89388b96add49691a070fc877d2569 189c8706304203e8eaa801c2ad225aef80911002
  • dependencies upgrade a3e705373ce4476310aaeb161beef3022bdf7be1

entry.title: New release for GoDoxy: v0.9.10
entry.content:
This is a security patch with all dependencies updated to the latest

Fixed:

| NAME | INSTALLED | FIXED-IN | TYPE | VULNERABILITY | SEVERITY | |-------------------------------|-----------|----------|------------|----------------------|----------| | github.com/go-jose/go-jose/v4 | v4.0.4 | 4.0.5 | go-module | GHSA-c6gw-w398-hv78 | Medium | | github.com/golang-jwt/jwt/v5 | v5.2.1 | 5.2.2 | go-module | GHSA-mh63-6h87-95cp | High | | golang.org/x/net | v0.35.0 | 0.36.0 | go-module | GHSA-qxp5-gwg8-xv66 | Medium |

entry.title: New release for GoDoxy: v0.10.0
entry.content:
What's changed

New

  • feature: GoDoxy Agent - maintain secure connection between main server and other docker nodes (agents) by authenticating and encrypting with mutual TLS (mTLS).
  • No more exposing docker socket: drops the need of docker-socket-proxy
  • No more exposing app ports: fewer attack surfaces

yaml services: app: ... # ports: # this part is not needed on agent server # - 6789

  • Secure: no one can connect to it except GoDoxy main server because of mTLS, plus connection is encrypted
  • Fetch info from agent server, e.g. CPU usage, Memory usage, container list, container logs, etc...

Setup procedures:

  1. Create a directory for agent server, cd into it
  2. Navigate to Metrics tab in Web UI, click Add agent, fill in required information then click Copy docker compose

  3. Paste the docker compose into a file (e.g., compose.yml) on the agent server then start it with docker compose up -d

  4. ui: enhanced Web UI design

  5. ui: enhanced idlewaker loading page design (d105f866ff643b7762a0bea9d237da495b3c0bbd)
  6. metrics: collect uptime and system information (e.g. CPU Usage, Memory Usage, Network I/O, etc.) and added "Metrics" page in Web UI (like Uptime Kuma and beszel)
  7. added /app/data mount point for storing metrics data
  8. docker: added "Docker" page in Web UI for rendering container logs (like Dozzle)
  9. docker: blacklist certain docker images (e.g. headless browser containers, backend services) from proxying by default (3c515b02581daabaa4557dd26bc19fab2d5c7ed4)
  10. oidc: now GoDoxy redirects user to a block page when user or group not in the allow list. (f72d9aee80b993bbbd1db65cf58551afddc4855a)
  11. oidc: support end_session_endpoint discovery, removed OIDC_LOGOUT_URL environment variable. (cba7338d8d9f7beac9c5ab68ec3dc31752fcf402)
  12. autocert: display cert information and button for cert renewal in Web UI (a557684542de69deec540df21f793bac95c14e22)
  13. misc: introduce GODOXY_FRONTEND_PORT environment variable (5ea82645ef3e3f0626c723e4c16f1f805914b214)

Fixes

  • api: allow login when not using HTTPS (#73 login loop issue) by explicitly setting API_JWT_SECURE to false (f966ca8b833adf05b52b21d76d3118a42cb06711)
  • misc: fixed race condition in certain scenarios

Changes

  • api: GoDoxy now generates a random JWT secret if not present (2f24a1db41009bb9f1ed9be33763b2ba4024cbbc)
  • CI/CD: improved GitHub workflow and Dockerfile (39381a17de703c7a603de3ed677633ad4e9d6e43) (9006049d33b6adf28a24a05176f2fa053be46399)
  • security: validate route config to disallow proxying to GoDoxy itself (c8935102c33c306e5ac6c1a2472544fd3bff0015)
  • security: sanitize path and URL from user input and other sources (f3840d56af3ffe96d65d3fdc03d779a762d3afe2) (17ef5cb9a529c1fe2c5fbcea1cecbbb614dd2648)
  • misc: use HTTP 308 (Permanent Redirect) instead of 301 (Moved Permanently) for redirectHTTP middleware (821e4a225aff62614301cb6a1c95496ff4721279)
  • misc: removed forwardAuth middleware
  • misc: removed some Prometheus metrics (subject to drop Prometheus support entirely) (366c89164f07fc323c734966c473ff138fea743d)
  • general performance improvements and reduced memory usage
  • dependencies upgraded
